summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing preparation of plans, specifications, and cost estimates; authorizing a permit application to the United States, Department of the Army, Corps of Engineers; authorizing application for a permit under the Shoreline Management Act and authorizing negotiations for an agreement with the Port of Seattle, all in connection with the replacement of the South Spokane Street East Waterway Bridge, and making an appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund therefor.
